reviewText:
It is an impressive image, but for the casual user I expected more than 4 (more or less the same) 15 second images.

It worked find in my home haunted house.

This DVD is intended to play via a video projector onto a wall or screen (with maybe some fog) OR on a Flatscreen TV in a VERTICAL style, meaning that you must turn the TV on its side (we suggest mounting it like a window for your haunt guests to look into.) The same girl Ghost has 4 different sayings to pick from.
